title: Enterprise Linux Can Force NVIDIA To Fix Wayland
description:
Nvidia on Wayland is still in a bit of a mess of a state with problematic drivers, and no amount of whining on the desktop is going to address that, however I do think the calculation is a bit different if we look at the corporate linux space
